name: BAFF Halloween
description:
BAFF Halloween is a minimalist, hardcore, and challenging game in the avoid-em-up genre with a creepy style that will test your reflexes, timing, and planning! This game is as hard as hell!

In this game, you have to play as an eye, which must collect all the candy corn in the level to activate the portal that will take you to the next level. Collect crystals without touching the walls, avoid traps, and try to keep control, because this game is as difficult as hell!

In BAFF Halloween:

- 50 levels
- Traps
- Eye
- Candy corn
- Timer (on/off)
- Halloween art
- Achievements
